alcohol.details: Can cause skin dryness and irritation.

sodium lauryl sulfate.details: Can be harsh on the skin and cause irritation.

glycerin.details: Hydrates skin and is generally safe.

fragrance.details: Can cause allergic reactions and skin irritation.

triclosan.details: May disrupt endocrine function and harm the skin.

formaldehyde.details: Known to cause allergic skin reactions.

retinol.details: Aids in reducing wrinkles and fine lines.
